page.title: 04A Day in School.
page.content: At 9.00am school starts, the children go in.They take off their coats, get what they need from their bags and then go in their classrooms.The teacher calls out the attendance register.The register is something teachers call out to see if everyone is here or not.Teachers also call out the{Dinner Register.}The dinner register records what you are having for your lunch.If you are going Swimming you give in your{30p. }After this you get on with your{Maths.}The bell goes for playtime. After play everyone gets on with the {Domesday {Project. }12.00pm everyone packs up and go for lunch. 12.40pm the{Swimming {Bus}comes and the 3 classes that are going get on the bus.2.40pm the swimmers come back and then they have a story.When the bell goes at 3.15pm it is the end of a typical day.
